thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 3 of 3515
thread.title: Ann

author: Ann
title: Ann
text:
Well, I am from the US and I heard the shipping from the US is FINE! I've heard bad things about shipping outside the US. I love this website though, it's good. Very famous books for low prices, for twenty dollars i bought more books on this website than on barnes and noble.
They are used book, so just a heads up if anything. I also always use paypal to do any sort of transaction because I'm just paranoid about them stealing my credit card info, however, I've had no problem, and i know people who used their credit card to purchase from them. Give it a try, start with something small, only ten dollars needed to receive free shipping.
